Class QuizGameViewController

java.lang.Object
controller.QuizGameViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuizGameView.Observer
public class QuizGameViewController extends Object implements QuizGameView.Observer
Controller for the quiz game view. Handles events from the view and updates the game state.
